title: ENKA Cosmetics
excerpt: Complete redesign and rebuild of a cosmetics store in southern Spain. The project included automated scraping from distributor retail sites, a full migration from WordPress, and a fast rebuild using Next.js, Sanity, and Bootstrap to restore the brand’s digital presence.

techStack.title: Next.js
techStack.info: Next.js is a React framework that enables modern web applications with static and dynamic rendering optimized for performance and SEO.

techStack.title: Sanity
techStack.info: Sanity is a headless content management platform ideal for building flexible and scalable experiences. In this project, it was used as the structured product database.

techStack.title: Shibrio
techStack.info: Shibrio is an automated scraping tool that efficiently extracts structured data from third-party websites.

techStack.title: Bootstrap
techStack.info: Bootstrap is a CSS framework that allows rapid development of responsive web interfaces, perfect for quick and consistent layout.

techStack.title: CSS
techStack.info: CSS was used to customize components and adapt the design precisely and consistently to the brand’s aesthetics.

testimonial.name: Client Name
testimonial.quote: Thanks to this collaboration, ENKA was able to come back strong online. The team saved our brand!

challenge: The brand had completely lost its website and database due to previous mismanagement. Without access to their old content or catalog, they needed a fast, secure, and scalable solution to return to the digital market without sacrificing functionality or performance.
solution: An automated scraping system with Shibrio was designed to rebuild the catalog from retailers. A brand new website was built with Next.js and Sanity as CMS, using Bootstrap to speed up layout. The platform is now fast, secure, and ready to scale with new features.
